subject: Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Baseball Comissioner Bud Selig, the former Brewers owner, may have had a surge in popularity by overseeing the punishment of Ryan Braun for doping.
snippet: Baseball Comissioner Bud Selig, the former Brewers owner, may have had a surge in popularity by overseeing the punishment of Ryan Braun for doping.
